document.title: Java Concurrency in Practice
document.authors: Joshua Bloch;Brian Goetz;Tim Peierls;Joseph Bowbeer;David Holmes;Doug Lea

content: Avoid the temptation to use thread priorities, since they increase platform dependence and can cause liveness problems. Most concurrent applications can use the default priority for all threads.

document.title: Microservice Architecture
document.authors: Irakli Nadareishvili, Ronnie Mitra, Matt McLarty, and Mike Amundsen

content: The possibility of increasing the number of internal meetings with large groups at Amazon in the early days of their AWS services implementation prompted Jeff Bezos to quip: No, communication is terrible! Jeff Bezos, Amazon founder and CEO This led to Bezos’ now famous “two-pizza team” rule. Any team that cannot be fed by two pizzas is a team that is too big.
“Always forgive your enemies,” said Oscar Wilde, “nothing annoys them so much.”
